memberdef.name: NLTYPE_FIXED
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* Newline is a fixed length string */

memberdef.name: NLTYPE_ANY
memberdef.initializer: 1 /* Newline is any Unicode line ending */

memberdef.name: NLTYPE_ANYCRLF
memberdef.initializer: 2 /* Newline is CR, LF, or CRLF */

memberdef.name: IS_NEWLINE
memberdef.initializer: ((NLBLOCK->nltype != NLTYPE_FIXED)? \ ((p) < NLBLOCK->PSEND && \ _pcre_is_newline((p), NLBLOCK->nltype, NLBLOCK->PSEND, &(NLBLOCK->nllen),\ utf8)) \ : \ ((p) <= NLBLOCK->PSEND - NLBLOCK->nllen && \ (p)[0] == NLBLOCK->nl[0] && \ (NLBLOCK->nllen == 1 || (p)[1] == NLBLOCK->nl[1]) \ ) \ )

memberdef.name: WAS_NEWLINE
memberdef.initializer: ((NLBLOCK->nltype != NLTYPE_FIXED)? \ ((p) > NLBLOCK->PSSTART && \ _pcre_was_newline((p), NLBLOCK->nltype, NLBLOCK->PSSTART, \ &(NLBLOCK->nllen), utf8)) \ : \ ((p) >= NLBLOCK->PSSTART + NLBLOCK->nllen && \ (p)[-NLBLOCK->nllen] == NLBLOCK->nl[0] && \ (NLBLOCK->nllen == 1 || (p)[-NLBLOCK->nllen+1] == NLBLOCK->nl[1]) \ ) \ )

memberdef.name: PCRE_NOPARTIAL
memberdef.initializer: 0x0001 /* can't use partial with this regex */

memberdef.name: PCRE_STUDY_MAPPED
memberdef.initializer: 0x01 /* a map of starting chars exists */

memberdef.name: PT_LAMP
memberdef.initializer: 1 /* L& - the union of Lu, Ll, Lt */

memberdef.name: XCL_NOT
memberdef.initializer: 0x01 /* Flag: this is a negative class */

memberdef.name: ctype_meta
memberdef.initializer: 0x80 /* regexp meta char or zero (end pattern) */

memberdef.argsstring: (const uschar *, int, const uschar *, int *, BOOL)
memberdef.name: _pcre_is_newline

memberdef.argsstring: (const uschar *, int, const uschar *, int *, BOOL)
memberdef.name: _pcre_was_newline
